abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column; Heinz Tomato Ketchup Blended with Balsamic Vinegar will have limited initial availability, distributed only to fans of brand's Facebook page, in effort to create buzz for the new product before it hits store in December.
snippet: Heinz Tomato Ketchup Blended with Balsamic Vinegar will be available on Facebook starting Nov. 14 in advance of its supermarket debut in December.
lead_paragraph: Heinz Tomato Ketchup Blended with Balsamic Vinegar will be available on Facebook starting Nov. 14 in advance of its supermarket debut in December.

headline.main: Ketchup Moves Upmarket, With a Balsamic Tinge
headline.print_headline: Ketchup Moves Upmarket, With A Balsamic Tinge
